revised_title: Eukaryotic Ribosomes Frameshifting Efficiency in Escherichia Coli Release Factor 2 Expression
tldr: The author conducted experiments to study the frameshifting efficiency of eukaryotic ribosomes during the expression of Escherichia coli release factor 2 (RF-2). They found that frameshifting occurs with a limited efficiency of approximately 0.4% in rabbit reticulocyte lysate ribosomes. This discovery helps to understand the translation process of genes with frameshift events.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Molecular Biology
